mapper.select: SELECT board_no boardNo, board_title boardTitle, member_id memberId, board_date boardDate FROM board WHERE board_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchBoard}, '%') ORDER BY board_no DESC
SELECT board_title boardTitle, member_id memberId, board_date boardDate, board_contents boardContents, board_no boardNo FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, member_id, board_contents, board_date ) VALUES( #{boardTitle}, #{memberId}, #{boardContents}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no boardNo, board_title boardTitle, member_id memberId, board_date boardDate FROM board ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
